title: Need Emergency Help! SNL Digital Short Logo Font ID! (It's Not Gotham!)
content:
I need to ID the typeface used in the Saturday Night Live Digital Short splash screen, as seen here:

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/2d/SNL\_Digital\_Shorts-title.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623005705/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/2d/SNL_Digital_Shorts-title.png)

I have searched the forums and scoured the net, and the only near miss that I have found was one Typophile's suggestion of Engraver's 2 or Sackers. I don't think that is correct, however (look at the 'G'!) I could definitely use some pro's help here!

Many thanks,  
tcvanp3570
author: tcvanp3570

comments.content: I think it’s Trade Gothic Bold Extended, [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623005705/http:/typophile.com/node/33713) 90% horizontally.
